overview:
CTO and Co-Founder.

Peter created the original design of the iPowow concept of “the ask”. The first mobile version was built using Google Application Engine which tested all the functions and loading requirements. Peter now drives the engineering team that has lifted the functionally of iPowow to new levels of load handling by writing a completely new system that has been optimised to handle high levels of real-time connections with high peak loads to meet the needs of Live events. Peter is also heavily involved in normal day to day running of the company from operations through to strategy.
